channel.title: INfinance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INfinance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: These 15 tech stocks could rocket up to 85% in a year — and analysts love them
item.description: Nvidia and Alphabet are among the tech stocks that garner mostly bullish ratings from analysts — and have high upside to the average price target.

item.title: Nike is succeeding in clearing inventory. That’s one reason it’s time to buy the stock.
item.description: Jefferies analysts are advising “aggressively” buying Nike’s beaten-down stock.

item.title: Newer investors have been rewarded for buying market dips. That won’t last forever.
item.description: The bull market of the last few years may have given newer investors a false sense of security.

item.title: Is going to college worth it? Ask these 5 questions to make sure it’s a good investment for you.
item.description: “College does not pay off for everyone,” according to a new report from the New York Fed.

item.title: Does TikTok give good financial advice? How to screen ‘finfluencer’ tips without putting your money at risk.
item.description: Social media has become a key source of financial advice for millions of Americans who did not learn about money at home or in school. Is this a good ...

item.title: Financial Services Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: Gain insight on Experian, SoFi Technologies and more in the latest Market Talks covering Financial Services.

item.title: Comex Gold, Silver Settle Lower
item.description: Gold settled 1.4% lower, down two of the past three sessions, and silver fell 2.5%, down three of the past four sessions.

item.title: DeepSeek Won't Sink U.S. AI Titans
item.description: Panic fueling the selloff of Nvidia, Broadcom and other tech giants is overblown.
